snippet: The memorial for the saxophonist David S. Ware on Monday at St. Peter’s Church was a bittersweet confirmation of his legacy, in words and images but especially in music.
abstract: Several avant-garde jazz musicians honor the legacy and skill of saxophonist David S Ware, who died at age 62, during his memorial service at St Peter's Church.
lead_paragraph: The memorial for the saxophonist David S. Ware on Monday at St. Peter’s Church was a bittersweet confirmation of his legacy, in words and images but especially in music.

headline.seo: Memorial Service for David S. Ware, Jazz Saxophonist
headline.main: Free Improvisation at a Memorial Helps Affirm a Saxophonist’s Legacy
headline.print_headline: Free Improvisation at a Memorial Helps Affirm a Saxophonist’s Legacy
